explains: n. 鱼片；头带；平边；饰线
wordGroup: fillet radius 圆角半径；内圆角半径；齿根圆角半径；过渡圆半径
fillet steak 菲力牛排；里脊扒；里脊肉牛排

sentences.en: I put a forkful of fillet steak in my mouth.
sentences.cn: 我往嘴里塞了一叉无骨鱼排。

sentences.en: Susan rummages around for a cod and cuts off a fillet.
sentences.cn: 苏珊翻滚着一条鳕鱼并且切下了一块鱼排。

sentences.en: You will also learn about the use of the Taper object, Fillet option and Bevel function.
sentences.cn: 您还将了解锥度对象、圆角选项和斜角功能的使用。
